original_text: That is why it was called Babel—because there the Lord confused the language of the whole world. From there the Lord scattered them over the face of the whole earth.
korean_text: 그러므로 그 이름을 바벨이라 하니 이는 여호와께서 거기서 온 땅의 언어를 혼잡하게 하셨음이니라 여호와께서 거기서 그들을 온 지면에 흩으셨더라

sentences.original_text: That is why it was called Babel
the language of the whole world
From there the Lord scattered them
over the face of the whole earth
